article_title: With Obamacare Upheld, Look for Consolidation in Health Care, Insurance

article_metadata.description: Ken Davis, CEO of Mount Sinai Health System, said that the Supreme Court's decision in favor of Obamacare in June likely saved certain hospital systems.
article_metadata.author: Rhonda Schaffler
